name: Deeper and Deeper (Ephemeral Games)
description:
Two hours ago, Detective Ishani Deeper was sunning herself on the deck of the Sea Maiden, having won an all-expenses paid cruise in a competition she didn't remember entering. Now, she's at residence of the most prominent family in Pleasantville,  investigating a murder and the disappearance of her partner, Jacob Deeper (no relation).  

Explore a procedurally generated house, gather evidence and confront the suspects in this mystery adventure roguelike! 

Press 'M' to reload the house if you wind up in an impossible, non-Euclidean basement.
